name: RPGKingOffical2K/4K
description: Explore the reaches of an old cold castle, in a immersive RPG medieval experience in first person, combined with a mystical and chivalrous background, traverse plains, protect yourself with a shield, fight enemy hoards, travel across tunnel network systems. Lure monsters, implode traps, and accidentally might blow yourself. Exploration of different frequent changing environments. To find reason, explore a unknown mystical world, to become stronger with passion of killed enemy souls. And to find redemption against those who were stronger, or find survival escaping quickly.
